name: Magnet (ZPiDER)
description:
You are a magnet. Escape from a desolate concrete hell and use your bipolar disorder to your advantage!

Submission for the Klagenfurt Game Jam with the topic "Together|Apart" - unfortunately time ran out before i could add that part (the story) - where Magnet finds out by flipping quickly he can produce electricity and through that finds his love Magnot but cant get to her. And when he finally does he is repelled by her magnetic condition. Finally they let themselves be heated up so they are not magentic any longer and now they can touch, but oh noes, now they are locked in that room forever.
